{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Home Assistant Green.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Home Automation Gateway |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.home-assistant.io/green/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Home_Assistant_Green |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Incompatible |openwrtsupport = Not Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Home Assistant |model = Green |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Rev 1.0 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/03/2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Home_Assistant_Green |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = home automation controller, home monitoring gateway, IoT hub |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3566; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kioxia;THGAMVG8T13BAIL; |flash1size = 32 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q128JWSQ; |flash2size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4UBE3D4ABM-GCL; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2023.07.02;; |stockos = Linux;6.1.56;Home Assistant OS 11.0;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, HDMI, Micro SD card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, Micro SD card slot, RTC w/ battery, heatsink |addchip = Power Management IC;Rockchip;RK809-5;;1;,,, CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = Nabu Casa |manuf_model = NC-GREEN-1175 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2023 |estprice = 99 |upc = 794677011758 |ean = 0794677011758 |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0CP58PG2V |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Home Assistant Green Rev 1.0" silkscreened on top of board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3566 @1.8GHz :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A55) *GPU: ''Mali-G52 2EE'' (OpenGL ES3.2); NPU 0.8Tops @INT8 :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16MB NOR Flash, 32GB eMMC, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Network: 1x 1GbE port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 12V/1A barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/rockchip-based-home-assistant-green-can-now-be-pre-ordered/ ''Rockchip-based Home Assistant Green'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/09/20/home-assistant-green-low-cost-home-assistant-gateway-beginners/ ''Home Assistant Green'' on '''CNX|Software''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> Home Assistant Green Top.jpeg|Board Top Home Assistant Green Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
